item.title: Spread Classification
item.description:
• Collaborated with a start-up focused on detecting Social Media Manipulation and the Computer Vision Lab at EPFL
  • Reviewed the literature on Geometric Deep Learning and Social Media Manipulation Detection and Computer Vision
  • Built a graph classifier using PyTorch, Ignite and DGL
  • Compared against benchmarks in Natural Language Processing

item.title: RASP
item.description:
• Created an asynchronous yet fair Rock Paper Scissors game
  • Coded the UI in React and the supporting blockchain in Golang

item.title: Indoor Navigator
item.description: Implemented a plugin to the EPFLCampus ioS app to localize users inside campus buildings and navigate them to their desired destination in augmented reality

item.title: Pitchgrader
item.description:
• Built an application to analyze Football and Tennis fields in Switzerland
  • Used NodeJS and React for the web app
  • Preprocessed satellite images in OpenCV

item.title: Catapult VR
item.description: Optimized accurate and intuitive hand interactions with a VR catapult in a ’Angry Birds’-like game on Unity

item.title: Neocaritas
item.description:
• Won first prize at StartHack 2018 out of 350+ participants.
  • Created a decentralized application running on the Neo blockchain to facilitate the process of donations

item.title: Spellcraft
item.description: Built the UX for a multiplayer wizard fighting augmented-reality game for the Microsoft Hololens
